name: RequestGroup.status
title: RequestGroup.status
purpose: Data Elements are defined for each element to assist in questionnaire construction etc

element.short: draft | active | on-hold | revoked | completed | entered-in-error | unknown
element.definition: The current state of the request. For request groups, the status reflects the status of all the requests in the group.
element.isModifierReason: This element is labeled as a modifier because it is a status element that contains status entered-in-error which means that the resource should not be treated as valid

binding.description: Codes identifying the lifecycle stage of a request.
